responsibilities: Working as a Full-stack developer on HCL WCS Commerce.
Maintaining the front-end legacy code and developing new functionalities for the Angular application in the WCS system.
Maintaining and enhancing Java backend applications, while also developing new applications using modern Java frameworks like Spring Boot.

projects.description: Working on the UI of the e-commerce application website in making the pages dynamic using Angular and implementing various features in Angular.

projects.name: Building microservices for WCS
projects.description: Developing new microservice APIs to modernise and extend the capabilities of the existing WebSphere commerce application. Maintaining and debugging legacy Java and JSP applications, including identifying and resolving issues within the codebase.

responsibilities: Working as a Full-stack developer on a web application product used in the hospitality industry.
Working on Angular 12 and translating wireframes to develop new functionalities on UI.
Backend development using Java Spring Boot to create new service endpoints along with the business logic written in Java as well as SQL packages.
Working with PO and the technical manager and getting requirements from the client.
Trained and mentored a backend and a frontend team separately on their respective technologies.

projects.name: Maxxton software
projects.description: Worked in the frontend in developing web pages and in the backend creating microservice endpoints as well as business logic.

responsibilities: Followed through the development of a customer-facing web application till its release which was being developed to automate processes for the travel industry.

Worked on Server-side business logic and making new service endpoints in NodeJS as a backend for multiple frontend end applications along with database management.
